text: Kléber Mesquida (born August 3, 1945) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Hérault department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Kléber Mesquida
